question: Which of the following countries has developed the world's fastest car Venom GT?
explanation: US firm Hennessey's Venom GT set the new record for the fastest car in the world during a test run at the Kennedy Space Centre in Florida. Venom beat the previous best record of 431km/h set by Bugatti Veyron Super Sport. Venom GT is a stretched Lotus Exige with a 7.0-litre, 927kW twin-turbo V8 wedged between its axles.
